CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 30,31 Numerous attempts to develop novel D-A copolymers have shown that 4,7-dithien-2-yl-2,1,3-benzothiadiazole ( DTBT ) is an effective acceptor unit , and photovoltaic devices made from blends with fullerene derivatives show PCE up to 5.4% .

Let's think step by step.
1. 4,7-dithien-2-yl-2,1,3-benzothiadiazole (DTBT) - This is the name of the acceptor unit mentioned in the paragraph. It is a specific material used in the development of D-A copolymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. 4,7-dithien-2-yl-2,1,3-benzothiadiazole (DTBT) - This is the name of the material mentioned in the paragraph that is relevant to the discussion of developing D-A copolymers for photovoltaic devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 30,31 Numerous attempts to develop novel D-A copolymers have shown that 4,7-dithien-2-yl-2,1,3-benzothiadiazole ( DTBT ) is an effective acceptor unit , and photovoltaic devices made from blends with fullerene derivatives show PCE up to 5.4% .

7. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
8. Up to 5.4%

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 30,31 Numerous attempts to develop novel D-A copolymers have shown that 4,7-dithien-2-yl-2,1,3-benzothiadiazole ( DTBT ) is an effective acceptor unit , and photovoltaic devices made from blends with fullerene derivatives show PCE up to 5.4% .

Let's think step by step.

1. Numerous attempts: This is a quantitative expression of the number of attempts, not a property value.
2. 30, 31: These are specific numbers and not property values.
3. Numerous attempts to develop novel D-A copolymers: This is a description of an action, not a property value.
4. 4,7-dithien-2-yl-2,1,3-benzothiadiazole (DTBT): This is a chemical compound and not a property value.
5. is an effective acceptor unit: This is a qualitative description, not a property value.
6. and photovoltaic devices made from blends with fullerene derivatives: This is a description of a system, not a property value.
7. show PCE up to 5.4%: Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) is a property value.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
The material 4,7-dithien-2-yl-2,1,3-benzothiadiazole (DTBT) has a maximum Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) of 5.4% in photovoltaic devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value          |
|-----------------------|
| Maximum PCE of 5.4%    |
| For DTBT in photovoltaic devices |
